level.heading: Contradictory terms of instrument.
level.text: If an instrument contains contradictory terms, typewritten terms prevail over printed terms, handwritten terms prevail over both, and words prevail over numbers.

level.heading: UNIFORM COMMERCIAL CODE COMMENT
level.text: Section 3-114 replaces subsections (b) and (c) of former Section 3-118.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-249, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:3-101.
